ActPublic Service Staff Relations Act
PrecisRe-appointment of IAN R. MACKENZIE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Public Service Staff Relations Board to hold office during good behaviour for a period of four years, effective July 3, 2004.
